title: Workshop on Integrating Social Domain Expert Knowledge through Multimedia-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in social studies and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance professionals' (medical/legal/technical) ability to visualize and interpret social data

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 80% of key information using signal-emphasis techniques when analyzing social phenomena.
Learners can apply three or more methods to visually represent abstract concepts by incorporating graphic elements (charts, diagrams).
Learners design one multimedia learning resource that connects their major field (medical/legal/technical) with social data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
